overview: Attempting to reverse the disheartening memories of his late father, Eric, an AmerAsian graduate, assumes a younger athlete's identity to take back his one last year of college baseball. Along with Danny, another graduate hiding his true identity, Eric battles his way onto the team, eying the attention of the professional scouts. But along his journey, he develops an ... Read all  Director Roger Lim Writers Roger LimKey Payton(revised version) Stars Roger LimAngel MonroeAndy Hnilo
title: Young American Dream
